Excellent quality.  Definitley agree with oithatguyoi.  Just watch the sample; it looks like a damn dvdrip.  Thank you for this.

Love when dumb asses complain about a movies quality when it is just released. This is amazing quality and perfectly watchable, if you don't like it go fucking buy a ticket and watch it in the theater.

for sure it's watchable, A=7 / V=6; but b'cos there R quite a few darkish scenes in this film, quality suffers most in these parts & it's a little difficult 2 see what's happening; turning up brightness / contrast doesn't help much either.... look, overall it's pretty good for TS ver if u just can't wait 2 watch.
